1.text: Every afternoon Ram's mother prepares a snack for tea. This is how she makes roti. Match the pictures with the sentences. Learn and try out.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Every afternoon Ram's mother prepares a snack for tea. This is how she makes roti. Match the pictures with the sentences. Learn and try out.</prosody></speak>

2.text: a. First, the flour, salt and scraped coconut are mixed and water is
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>a. First, the flour, salt and scraped coconut are mixed and water is</prosody></speak>

3.text: added to make a soft dough. b. Then, the dough is divided into equal portions. c. Next, the portions of the dough are flattened to make a roti. d. After that, a little oil is applied on the skillet and is placed over
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>added to make a soft dough. b. Then, the dough is divided into equal portions. c. Next, the portions of the dough are flattened to make a roti. d. After that, a little oil is applied on the skillet and is placed over</prosody></speak>

4.text: medium heat. e. The roti is baked for a few minutes, until it is turned brown. f. Finally, the other side of the roti is also baked well until it becomes brown and smells pleasant.
